document.full_text: emails released by court order from an arizona college about tucson shooting rampage suspect jared lee loughner show campus police were so worried they asked federal authorities whether he had a gun.
document.title: arizona college was worried loughner armed
lines_and_colors: emails released by court order from an arizona college about tucson shooting rampage suspect jared lee loughner show campus police were so worried they asked federal authorities whether he had a gun.
